Common.NoTransHistoryDetails: Transaction information for this product is currently not available. To view your transactions, please visit the full site at:

Errors.SessionTimeout: Sorry, your session has timed out. Please sign in again.
Errors.NetworkError: We are experiencing technical difficulty. Please try again later.

Login.WelcomeTitle: Welcome to our new mobile website!
Login.WelcomeBody:
Our new mobile website was designed with one person in mind: you. Here you'll find many of the features you're already using, but we've made them clearer, easier to find, and simpler to use.

If you're not ready to try out the Beta version, you can still bank through any of the following:

Validation.CardNumber: A valid Card Number is required
Validation.VerifyCode: A valid verification code is required
Validation.ProductTypeFieldError: Please select a product or username.
Validation.ProductNumberFieldError: Enter the card or account number.
Validation.DobFieldError: Please enter your date of birth.
Validation.DOBMonthError: Enter the month you were born.
Validation.DOBDayError: Enter the day you were born.
Validation.DOBYearError: Enter the year you were born.
Validation.PleaseSelectAToAccountTransfer: Please select a "To" account for the funds you are transferring.
Validation.PleaseSelectAFromAccountTransfer: Please select a "From" account for the funds you are transferring
Validation.PleaseSelectAFromAccountPayBills: Select an account to pay from
Validation.PleaseSelectAQuestion: You must respond to the security question to continue banking
Validation.PleaseEnterAnAmount: You need to enter an amount to continue.
Validation.TheSmallestTransactionAmount: The smallest transaction amount allowed is one cent. Enter a greater amount.
Validation.LimitGreater: You have entered an amount greater than the limit allowed. Enter a lesser amount and re-submit your payment.
Validation.TransferAmountExceedsMaxDailyLimit: Transfer amount exceeds maximum daily limit.
Validation.TransferAmountLessThanMinRequired: Transfer amount is less than the minimum required amount.
Validation.EnterYourAnswerText: The format of the Answer is invalid
Validation.EnterYourSecurityQuestionText: Create a valid security question for this e-Transfer
Validation.EMTQuestionLength: Security question must be 1-39 characters long.
Validation.EMTAnswerCharacters: Answer contains invalid characters or spaces.
Validation.EMTMemoLength: Memo must have fewer than 400 characters.
Validation.EMTSendMinimum: You must send $10.00 at minimum. Please try again. (PA3052)
Validation.EMTSendMaximum: Maximum Interac e-Transfer amount is $3000.00. Please enter a new amount and try again. (PA3053)
Validation.YouMustEnter3Characters: Your answer must be at least 3 characters
Validation.DifferentThanUsername: Enter a password that is different from your username

MFA.Disclaimer: Mobile Banking and GB OnLineBanking use the same security questions. For help, please call 1-800-000-0000.
